Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{3: "On both sides of Constellia's shopping street, vibrant displays of melons and other fruits line the stalls. Lucia stands among them, locking eyes with you the moment you arrive."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "She walks up to you and naturally takes your hand, as if it's the most ordinary thing in the world."}
{3: 'A soft breeze passes between you right now, drifting gracefully ahead.'}
{3: 'Clink, clink—'}
{3: 'The wind chime outside the fruit shop jingles with a bright, clear note, as if beckoning new customers inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, shall we go pick some fruit?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory716.jpg'}
{3: 'You enter the fruit store, welcomed by sweet aromas. A vivid spectrum stretches before you as freshly washed fruits glisten under the lights on the sampling counter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You've been busy lately—fresh fruit might be exactly what you need to refuel and stay healthy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still talking, you pass a variety of fruits until a display of bright-red strawberries catches your eye.'}
{3: 'Lucia, as though sensing your thoughts, picks up a fork and plucks a strawberry from the sample tray.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These strawberries look pretty good, Commandant. Want to give them a try?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The sweet-and-sour flavor blossoms on your tongue, and the fresh fruit's unique fragrance spreads through your mouth."}
{2: 'Tastes pretty good.', 3: '28', 4: 'Not bad.', 5: '28', 6: 'This strawberry tastes exactly like strawberries should.', 7: '28'}
{2: "Lucia, why don't you try one too?", 3: '29'}
{3: 'Lucia leans in and takes a bite of the strawberry. As she chews, her crimson eyes shine even brighter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "This is pretty good, Commandant. Let's pick up a couple more boxes so Liv and Lee can have some.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Two boxes of strawberries mark the start of today's shopping trip, and you two walk through the vibrant lineup of fresh fruits."}
{3: 'The festive spirit is in full swing, with Double Seventh Festival banners everywhere. Couples are filing in and out, completely caught up in the joyous mood.'}
{3: 'As a result, a long queue forms in front of the cashier.'}
{3: 'You stand at the back of the line with Lucia, but your attention veers toward a temporary event area set up nearby.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '"Double Seventh Sweet Challenge"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia murmurs, sounding a bit puzzled. In the middle of the event space, two people are wrapped in a tight embrace.'}
{3: 'The staff member, responsible for marking this joyous occasion, nods and hands them a pink voucher.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'This voucher proves your sweet bond. Just show it at the reward booth to pick up a fruit tree sapling. May your love grow and flourish!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing the keyword, Lucia's eyes flick over in response."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A fruit sapling... Oh, over there.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Lucia's gesture, you see rows of fruit saplings at the back of the event area, stretching into a little oasis of shade."}
{3: 'That couple picks up their fruit sapling and heads off, chatting happily. As they leave, they reveal the slogan that was hidden.'}
{2: 'Plant a promise, harvest the future.', 3: '52'}
{2: 'It seems like a pretty interesting event.', 3: '53'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's take part too, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't see why not...", 3: '56'}
{2: "But we don't really have enough space in the lounge to plant a tree...", 3: '57', 4: "We normally don't have much time to look after a tree.", 5: '57'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's alright. We can hand the sapling over to the greenhouse to care for them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This way, when next year comes, we can come back here and harvest fruit that's entirely ours.", 4: '1'}
{3: "While you're talking, two more people head up to the event area, and the staff's enthusiastic welcome grabs Lucia's attention."}
{3: "She keeps her eyes on the people on stage, her hands making subtle movements as if she's practicing some sort of imitation."}
{3: "The couple steps onto the stage, striking a princess-carry pose for a sweet photo. As the camera clicks, they gently kiss each other's cheeks, and the staff hands them their coupon."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Here's the proof of your sweet bond—head over and claim your fruit sapling! May your love grow and flourish!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Now, who's next to join in? Is it you two?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Have you figured out how to show off your sweetness? Once you're ready, just step to the center.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, any ideas?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm still thinking.", 3: '70', 4: 'Do you have any ideas?', 5: '70'}
{3: "Lucia goes quiet for a moment, like she's double-checking something in her head. Then she nods firmly, and the bright glimmer in her eyes tells you she's ready."}
{3: "Your heart starts to race; you have no clue what she's planning."}
{3: 'Feeling a bit anxious, you step into the center of the event area. Under the spotlight, Lucia reaches out her hand to you.'}
{3: 'A gentle touch lifts your palm as Lucia lowers her head, pressing a soft kiss on the back of your hand.'}
{3: 'Her voice is barely audible, but you sense every subtle brush of her lips against your skin. A light, fruity scent swirls around you, delicately sweet.'}
{3: 'Then, those vivid crimson eyes slowly rise, laying her genuine feelings bare for you to see.'}
{3: "The sweetness Lucia offers is a passionate honesty that's uniquely her own."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{3: 'Clink, clink—'}
{3: 'The wind chimes jingle in front of the fresh fruit store, and sunlight makes everything on the street sparkle.'}
{3: 'Lucia holds a fruit sapling in one arm as she carefully closes the door with the other.'}
{3: 'She seals the cool air back into the shade behind her, then heads into the summer with you as you hold a bag of fresh fruit in hand.'}
{3: 'A dazzling future unfolds before her: the road bursts with vivid colors, the sky stretches out in clear blue, and a gentle breeze blows through the air.'}
{3: 'Under the brilliant sunlight, two hands join together once more.'}
